H0.text: They would die within hours is what would most likely happen to the plants if a deadly disease infected the hummingbird population, because those plants rely on hummingbirds for pollination.

H1.text: They would become endangered for the plants that rely on hummingbirds for pollination if a deadly disease infected the hummingbird population.

H2.text: They would need to migrate if a deadly disease infected the hummingbird population, because some plants rely on hummingbirds for pollination.

H3.text: They would grow at a slower rate if a deadly disease infected the hummingbird population that pollinates them.
